title: DJ Sona - Ultiimate skin
body:
Tbh guys  I think it looks great and all but I think it should be a legendary skin, I'd like something more creative to be an ultimate skin.  


whats your guys thoughts?

replies.body: TBH. There's more work in this skin than Spirit Guard Udyr. Three new soundtracks. Three modes. The mode morphs. The soundtracks. Oh yeah. Did I mention the soundtracks?
theres also the in-game music player sona brings.
This. SGU and PFE are nothing compared to this skin.
the sound tracks aren't rlly that good to me. If it was professional hardcore dubstep drops I'd  love it < 3
I actually think that this skin is so high quality they need to consider visually upgrading both Ezreal and Udyr.. because neither of them come close to how good this skin is.

I thinks its quite good actually, as someone who plays in the bot-lane i think its nice for a support to get some love.

I think everyone wanted a ultimate skin for thier role.. something to show off their skills in their lane.. and because its the least favorite role in the game (support) i think its turning alot of people salty.
I reckon they should release 2 ultimate skins this year. just for the lols
Do we have a release date?
